reviewText:
It's hard to teach children the importance of reducing our waste. More and more we're becoming a "throw away" society. This DVD is a great, fun tool for parents to teach their children how to be green.

Skip & Molly teach how to reuse things most people would throw away. They also do a real good job entertaining in an endearing and yet exciting way!

I would recommend this DVD to any parent who wants to start their kids being green at a young age!

Can't wait for more Skip, Molly, & Professor Dodo! When's the next DVD coming out?
